Html: Please help. Windows 8.1 computers are not downloading updates released. While appearing online, on your upgrade status appears: Unknown

Hi Angelalbo,
On the line you have selected I can see that the last report time of the client is 13/12/2013 !!!
Ensure this client can report status to the Wsus server.

Thank you very much

Actually the problem is solved and was wsus. Another query, when the Firewall is enabled do not appear online, if I disable the firewall I can visualize. What rule / port have to turn on the Windows Firewall?.

Thanks for your help.

Online state is query by pinging the computer.
